div.p: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system. Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.

Copyright Statement: This artifact includes content from Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system. ATC codes are copyright World Health Organization (WHO) Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology. Terms & Conditions in https://www.whocc.no/use_of_atc_ddd/

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://www.whocc.no/atc
